name: test_e2e_with_logs[219_CMD_ENV_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_ENV_001` |
| **Name** | Environment variable in PATH |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | env_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `PATH=/tmp:$PATH whoami`
- **Encoded**: `PATH%3D%2Ftmp%3A%24PATH%20whoami`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~21000ms
- **Timestamp**: 03:14:27.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_ENV_001-1767842067435-3gqudp pattern_id=CMD_ENV_001 uri=/?q=PATH%3D%2Ftmp%3A%24PATH%20whoami client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
03:14:27.000000000: Warning [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_ENV_001-1767842067435-3gqudp pattern_id=CMD_ENV_001 uri=/?q=PATH%3D%2Ftmp%3A%24PATH%20whoami client=127.0.0.1
```
